MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL28 postcode area of Colwyn Bay, affecting properties in Brymbo and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected  and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:40pm on 15th November 2020
